title: Different sort of system
brief_description: Looks at an alternative form of education at the Benedict Community school in New South Wales that is designed to meet the needs of school leavers who are unable to cope with the traditional school system. The course aims to encourage the development of the students as individuals and prepares them for their transition into the workforce.
